## Samelogic.(constructor)

Samelogic Client SDK API - instance constructor. The Samelogic class handles the creation and configuration of a client instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(options: Options);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [Options](./samelogic-js.options.md) | the configuration options for the client instance. |
